title: Mystery Curvy Serif
content:
Any ideas which family this belongs to?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090523234632im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/back-soon_4206.jpg)
author: bonerton

comments.content: [Leitura Display Swashes](http://web.archive.org/web/20090523234632/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/leitura-display/swashes/) by Dino dos Santos. Don’t know if german diacritics as ö, ä, ü are in the font, though. MyFonts doesn’t display them …
Oh, yes, they are. [Fontshop](http://web.archive.org/web/20090523234632/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/dstype/leitura_display_complete/) displays them correctly.
